item.title: 通胀数据公布后，美联储降息押注升温
item.description:
CPI报告公布后，股市再创新高，波动率下降。【原文：

Stocks rise to record, volatility drops after CPI report.

】

item.title: GoTo 连续第四年实现调整后利润，得益于成本削减
item.description: 印度尼西亚 GoTo 集团连续第四个季度实现调整后利润，在打车和送货领域的激烈竞争中，该集团在控制支出和提高收入方面取得了进展。【原文：Indonesia’s GoTo Group notched a fourth consecutive quarter of adjusted profit, making progress with reining in expenses and boosting revenue amid stiff competition in ride-hailing and delivery.】

item.title: 三菱公司将向赫德贝铜矿项目投资 6 亿美元
item.description: 三菱商事株式会社（Mitsubishi Corp. ）已同意支付 6 亿美元，购买赫德贝矿业公司（HudBay Minerals Inc.【原文：Mitsubishi Corp. has agreed to pay $600 million for a 30% stake in a proposed US copper project being developed by HudBay Minerals Inc.】

item.title: 穆迪上调巴基斯坦评级，因其金融状况有所改善
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）上调了巴基斯坦的信用评级，理由是巴基斯坦在国际货币基金组织贷款的支持下改善了财政状况。【原文：Moody’s Ratings upgraded Pakistan’s credit rating, citing its improved financial position supported by a loan from the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 中国已为贸易战做好准备，美国要学的还有很多
item.description:
美国的活力使其在自由贸易世界中占据优势，但中国已花费数十年时间为新的现实进行规划。【原文：

US dynamism gave it an edge in a free-trade world, but China has spent decades planning for the new reality.

】

item.title: 阿波罗将以 20 亿欧元收购冷却设备制造商 Kelvion
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司已同意从收购公司 Triton 手中收购德国冷却设备制造商 Kelvion。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. has agreed to acquire German cooling equipment maker Kelvion from buyout firm Triton.】

item.title: 股市再创新高，投资者仍加强防御
item.description: 警示的旗帜已经飘扬了数周：美股创纪录的上涨掩盖了表面下的问题。【原文：The caution flags have been waving for weeks: The record run in US stocks is masking trouble beneath the surface.】

item.title: 南非商业情绪创四个月新高，关税是风险之一
item.description: 南非的商业信心攀升至四个月来的最高点，表明经营环境有所改善，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税带来的不确定性有可能逆转收益。【原文：South African business confidence climbed to a four-month high, signaling a better operating climate, although uncertainty from US President Donald Trump‘s tariffs threatens to reverse the gains.】

item.title: 赞比亚维持关键利率不变以抑制通货膨胀
item.description: 赞比亚中央银行连续第二次维持关键利率不变，以进一步遏制通货膨胀。【原文：Zambia’s central bank held its key interest rate for a second consecutive time to further contain inflation.】

item.title: 中国 7 月新增贷款二十年来首次出现萎缩
item.description: 7 月份，衡量中国银行贷款的一项关键指标出现了二十年来的首次收缩，而总体信贷增长放缓，这表明消费者和企业借款人的需求疲软。【原文：A key measure of lending at Chinese banks contracted for the first time in two decades in July while broad credit growth slowed, in a sign of weak demand from consumer and corporate borrowers.】

item.title: 英国平均抵押贷款利率自特鲁斯执政以来首次低于 5
item.description: 自 2022 年前首相利兹-特拉斯（Liz Truss）发布灾难性的小型预算案以来，英国普通抵押贷款的平均利率首次降至 5%以下。【原文：The average interest rate on a common UK mortgage has dropped below 5% for the first time since former prime minister Liz Truss’ calamitous mini-budget in 2022.】

item.title: 分析师称 BOT 下调后资金流入为泰国资产提供支持
item.description: 据分析师称，在泰国央行放宽政策以促进经济增长后，资金流入可能会进一步提振泰国股市和货币。【原文：Thailand’s stocks and currency may be further buoyed by inflows after the Bank of Thailand eased policy to bolster growth, according to analysts.】

item.title: 腾讯收入超预期，人工智能雄心大增
item.description: 腾讯控股有限公司（Tencent Holdings Ltd.）的营收超出预期，增强了投资者对其不断扩大的游戏和社交媒体组合将为日益激烈的全球人工智能竞赛提供干粉的预期。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd.’s revenue beat estimates, bolstering investor expectations that its expanding gaming and social media portfolio will provide dry powder for an intensifying global AI race.】

item.title: 加密货币公司 Bullish 在首次公开募股中筹资 11 亿美元，定价超出范围
item.description: Bullish 在首次公开募股中筹集了 11 亿美元，股票定价高于市场范围。【原文：Bullish raised $1.1 billion in an initial public offering, pricing its shares above the marketed range.】

item.title: 右翼创作者抓住英国反移民抗议的机会
item.description: 今年夏天，参加英国反移民抗议活动的右翼 "影响者 "在网上散布了一些误导性信息，这增加了首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）的压力，因为他正在努力减少非法移民。【原文：Misleading information spread online by right-wing “influencers" attending UK anti-immigrant protests this summer is adding to pressure on Prime Minister Keir Starmer, as he struggles to reduce illegal immigration.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片制造商 Iluvatar CoreX 据称酝酿在香港上市
item.description: 由于中国政府不鼓励本地公司使用英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）的处理器，投资者对中国人工智能芯片制造商的兴趣日益浓厚，Iluvatar CoreX 公司正考虑在香港首次公开募股。【原文：Iluvatar CoreX is considering an initial public offering in Hong Kong, as investor interest in Chinese artificial intelligence chipmakers builds with Beijing discouraging local firms from using Nvidia Corp. processors.】

item.title: 热浪袭来，欧洲终于用上了空调
item.description: 当欧洲汗流浃背地度过又一个气温创历史新高的夏天时，欧洲大陆的大部分地区正在经历一场迅速而又往往紧张的变革。【原文：As Europe sweats through another summer of record-high temperatures, much of the continent is undergoing a rapid and often tense transformation.】

item.description: 奇货可居：如何在阿拉斯加冰雪道路上运输货物（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: How to Move Freight Across Icy Alaskan Roads (Podcast)】

item.title: 国际能源署称明年全球石油市场将面临创纪录的供应过剩局面
item.description: 国际能源机构称，随着需求增长放缓和供应膨胀，明年全球石油市场将出现创纪录的过剩。【原文：Global oil markets are on track for a record surplus next year as demand growth slows and supplies swell, the International Energy Agency said.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Eisler 被逮捕后解雇的前交易员起诉，索赔 250 万英镑
item.description: 艾斯勒资本公司（Eisler Capital）被其解雇的一名前交易员告上法庭，原因是该交易员在对冲基金短暂工作期间被捕，而公司却迟迟未予披露。【原文：Eisler Capital was sued by an ex-trader it fired over a delay in disclosing his arrest during a short-lived employment at the hedge fund.】

item.title: Alvarez 聘用前阿波罗高管主管印度私人信贷业务
item.description: 咨询公司 Alvarez & Marsal Inc. 已任命阿波罗全球管理公司前董事总经理 Arpito Mukerji 领导其在印度新成立的私人信贷咨询业务。【原文：Advisory firm Alvarez & Marsal Inc. has appointed Arpito Mukerji, former managing director at Apollo Global Management Inc., to lead its newly formed private credit advisory business in India.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行发布新钞设计
item.description: 瑞士国家银行公布了 12 种可能的新法郎纸币设计，并呼吁公众提供反馈意见。【原文：The Swiss National Bank published 12 possible designs for new franc notes and called for feedback from the public.】

item.title: 德国军方瞄准 8,300 架无人机系统，落后于北约盟国
item.description: 随着全球在无人防御系统和自主武器方面的支出激增，德国军方希望在本十年结束前获得 8,300 套无人机系统，这一数字远远低于北约一些盟国的目标。【原文：The German military is looking to secure 8,300 drone systems by the end of the decade, far fewer than some of its NATO allies aim for, as spending on unmanned defense systems and autonomous weapons soars globally.】

item.title: 淡马锡支持的 ST Telemedia 据称考虑出售数据中心运营商 GDS 的股份
item.description: 知情人士透露，ST Telemedia 正在考虑出售其在中国数据中心运营商 GDS 控股有限公司（GDS Holdings Ltd. ）中的控股权。【原文：ST Telemedia is considering selling its holding in Chinese data center operator GDS Holdings Ltd., people familiar with the situation said.】

item.title: 保时捷亿万富豪希望成立投资基金，以利用军火市场的蓬勃发展
item.description: 保时捷公司和大众汽车公司的所有者正在成立一个国防工业投资基金，希望借助欧洲军费开支激增的东风。【原文：Porsche AG and Volkswagen AG’s owners are setting up a fund to make defense-industry investments, hoping to ride a surge in European military spending.】

item.title: 德国 PBB 银行因退出美国市场而损失 3.14 亿欧元，股价下跌
item.description: 德国储蓄银行（Deutsche Pfandbriefbank AG）因决定退出美国市场而计提了 3.14 亿欧元（3.67 亿美元）的费用，导致其股价下跌。【原文：Deutsche Pfandbriefbank AG’s shares dropped as it booked €314 million ($367 million) in charges on its decision to get out of the US.】

item.title: 泰国在塞塔普最后一次会议上降低利率，风险加剧
item.description: 泰国央行在行长塞塔普-素提瓦特那鲁普（Sethaput Suthiwartnarueput）领导的最后一次会议上下调了关键利率，塞塔普-素提瓦特那鲁普在五年任期结束后即将卸任，他与要求降低借贷成本的政府官员发生了冲突。【原文：The Bank of Thailand cut its key interest rate in the final meeting led by Governor Sethaput Suthiwartnarueput, who is bowing out after a five-year term that saw clashes with government officials demanding lower borrowing costs.】

item.title: 塔楼公司 EdgePoint 寻求 4.75 亿美元贷款用于投资者赔付
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，东南亚电信塔运营商 EdgePoint Infrastructure 正在寻求一笔 4.75 亿美元的私人贷款，用于支付股息。【原文：Southeast Asia telecom tower operator EdgePoint Infrastructure is seeking a $475 million private loan to fund a dividend payout, according to people familiar with the matter, adding to a slew of similar deals that have erupted globally in recent months.】

item.title: 在交易量提升后，Persimmon 预计英国房屋年销售量将上升
item.description: Persimmon Plc 表示，随着人们对住房反弹的乐观情绪升温，该公司有望在今年和 2026 年售出更多住房。【原文：Persimmon Plc said it was on track to sell more homes this year and in 2026 as optimism builds around a housing rebound.】
